secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

entity_watchlist_program_id.title: EntityWatchlistProgramID
entity_watchlist_program_id.description: ID of the associated entity program.

client_user_id.title: ClientUserID
client_user_id.description: A unique ID that identifies the end user in your system. This ID can also be used to associate user-specific data from other Plaid products. Financial Account Matching requires this field and the `/link/token/create` `client_user_id` to be consistent. Personally identifiable information, such as an email address or phone number, should not be used in the `client_user_id`.

status.description: A status enum indicating whether a screening is still pending review, has been rejected, or has been cleared.
status.title: WatchlistScreeningStatus

assignee.title: DashboardUserID
assignee.description: ID of the associated user. To retrieve the email address or other details of the person corresponding to this id, use `/dashboard_user/get`.

cursor.description: An identifier that determines which page of results you receive.
